mapper.select: select * from vpn.user where name=#{name} and pwd=#{pwd}
mapper.update: update vpn.user set score=score+#{score} where name=#{name}
update vpn.user set level=#{level} where name=#{name} and level < 3
update vpn.user set level=0 where level=3 and paidEndTime <= #{end}
update vpn.user set level=3, paidStartTime= #{start}, paidEndTime = #{end} where name=#{name}
update vpn.user set email=#{email} where name=#{name}
update vpn.user set score=score-190 where score >= 400
update vpn.user set score=score-100 where score >= 15000
update vpn.user set level=0 where score < 2500 and level < 3
update vpn.user set level=1 where score >= 2500 and score < 4500 and level < 3
update vpn.user set level=2 where score >= 4500 and level < 3
update vpn.user set level=0 where paidEndTime <= #{end} and channel='VPNB'
